claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: Header of the CDC’s Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report (MMWR), showing Recommendations and Reports, Vol. 71, No. 1, dated August 26, 2022. does not support the claim because the image contains only the report title and date without any data or statements regarding mutations in cell- and egg-based flu vaccines Note: Only the cover page header is visible; no vaccine production information is present
